name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_EVENT_PSYS_PL1_PECI
summary: Verify all CPUs in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to PSys (Platform RAPL) power limit 1 set via PSys PECI interface in duration by command: perf stat -a -e pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
